name: incognito-clone
title: Incognito Clone
description: Open the URL of the currently active tab in an Incognito (Chromium-based) or private (Webkit-based) browser window.
author: kgrhartlage

commands.name: clone
commands.title: Clone Tab
commands.subtitle: Incognito
commands.description: Open the URL of the currently active tab in an Incognito window.

commands.name: clone-and-close
commands.title: Clone and Close Tab
commands.subtitle: Incognito
commands.description: Close the currently active tab and open its URL in an Incognito window.
